attributes.action: Make E.M.A. available to everyone, or no one
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to make EMA available to all students in higher education, regardless of family earnings, or make it that no body gets it, as it is unfair that some students get EMA while hoters dont.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
